author: NABU Corporation
description:
The classic 1984 NABU Network experience.
AND Cycle Direct: skip the menu!

name: Ishkur CPM

programs.name: Ishkur CPM NFS
programs.author: teragav17
programs.description: Ishkur CP/M with the Hybrid NFS driver.

programs.name: Ishkur CPM NDSK
programs.author: teragav17
programs.description: Ishkur CP/M with the Hybrid NDSK driver

programs.name: Ishkur CPM IDE
programs.author: teragav17
programs.description: Ishkur CP/M with the Hybrid IDE driver

author: teragav17
description:
Ishkur is a flavor of CPM 2.2 made for the NABU from the ground up. System files are loaded via NHACP. 
This is the 'hybrid' flavor, and supports real drives (C & D) as well as cloud disks (A,B,E,etc).

name: NABU.ca
author: NABU.ca
description: Support for the NABU.ca feed and files for Cloud CP/M

name: NABU Launcher

paks.name: NABU Launcher
paks.description: The original headless launcher for the NABU

author: Nick Daniels
description:
Launch NABU programs from the comfort of your couch. No UI required!.
NNS can be switched into headless mode with `-s or --noui`
